channel.title: Client Crashing Error
channel.description:
Ok, well in PVP when I cast a spell on someone it makes my client crash and outputs this error....
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 629 at client.method101(client.java:7722) at client.method96(client.java:7464) at client.method114(client.java:8836) at client.method62(client.java:3014) at client.method7(client.java:2029) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4468) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Magic works fine on Npc's (No crashing etc.)

item.title: Client Crashing Error
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

method 114 and method 7.

is where your issue is .

Read full topic

item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

hm… maybe magic isn’t added on players. thats why pvp server are best!
